## Overview

Welcome to **IS655**, a graduate seminar at Old Dominion University taught by Dr. Austin Jersild. This site hosts 100 interactive labs exploring international history through data visualization, policy modeling, and computational analysis using R and Quarto.

## Lab Themes
- Imperial Systems
- Revolutions & Ideology
- Global Conflicts & Cold War Dynamics
- Decolonization & Development
- Institutions & Policy Memo Toolkits

## Getting Started
To begin, visit the [Syllabus](syllabus.html) or explore the labs by theme in the navigation bar.

Happy exploring!
